message:
selling gameboy pockets and 512gb micro sd cards!

SD cards are still in their packages
$70 each

3 x
Gameboy Pocket
LCDs have had their polarizers and reflective layer removed (they were previously burnt)
Some LCDs have had their ribbon cables desoldered and re-attached, but still function fine
You will need your own polarizers and backlight kit
OEM shell color options: yellow, black, red, green, atomic purple, silver, gold
Battery covers were missing when I bought them, unfortunately
$25 each

Also an option: the item listed above,  but without a screen
$20 each
